card.name: Sword Dancer
card.text: {W}{W}: Target attacking creature gets -1/-0 until end of turn.

card.name: Teferi's Puzzle Box
card.text: At the beginning of each player's draw step, that player puts the cards in his or her hand on the bottom of his or her library in any order, then draws that many cards.

card.name: Telepathy
card.text: Your opponents play with their hands revealed.

card.name: Temporal Adept
card.text: {U}{U}{U}, {T}: Return target permanent to its owner's hand.

card.name: Thieves' Auction
card.text: Exile all nontoken permanents. Starting with you, each player chooses one of the exiled cards and puts it onto the battlefield tapped under his or her control. Repeat this process until all cards exiled this way have been chosen.

card.name: Thieving Magpie
card.text: Flying Whenever Thieving Magpie deals damage to an opponent, draw a card.

card.name: Thorn Elemental
card.text: You may have Thorn Elemental assign its combat damage as though it weren't blocked.

card.name: Throne of Bone
card.text: Whenever a player casts a black spell, you may pay {1}. If you do, you gain 1 life.

card.name: Tidal Kraken
card.text: Tidal Kraken can't be blocked.

card.name: Trade Routes
card.text: {1}: Return target land you control to its owner's hand. {1}, Discard a land card: Draw a card.

card.name: Treasure Trove
card.text: {2}{U}{U}: Draw a card.

card.name: Tremor
card.text: Tremor deals 1 damage to each creature without flying.

card.name: Tundra Wolves
card.text: First strike

card.name: Twiddle
card.text: You may tap or untap target artifact, creature, or land.

card.name: Two-Headed Dragon
card.text: Flying {1}{R}: Two-Headed Dragon gets +2/+0 until end of turn. Two-Headed Dragon can't be blocked except by two or more creatures. Two-Headed Dragon can block an additional creature.

card.name: Underworld Dreams
card.text: Whenever an opponent draws a card, Underworld Dreams deals 1 damage to him or her.

card.name: Unholy Strength
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+1.

card.name: Unsummon
card.text: Return target creature to its owner's hand.

card.name: Urborg Volcano
card.text: Urborg Volcano enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {B} or {R} to your mana pool.

card.name: Urza's Armor
card.text: If a source would deal damage to you, prevent 1 of that damage.

card.name: Urza's Mine
card.text: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. If you control an Urza's Power-Plant and an Urza's Tower, add {C}{C} to your mana pool instead.

card.name: Urza's Power Plant
card.text: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. If you control an Urza's Mine and an Urza's Tower, add {C}{C} to your mana pool instead.

card.name: Urza's Tower
card.text: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. If you control an Urza's Mine and an Urza's Power-Plant, add {C}{C}{C} to your mana pool instead.

card.name: Vampiric Spirit
card.text: Flying When Vampiric Spirit enters the battlefield, you lose 4 life.

card.name: Venerable Monk
card.text: When Venerable Monk enters the battlefield, you gain 2 life.

card.name: Vengeance
card.text: Destroy target tapped creature.

card.name: Verduran Enchantress
card.text: Whenever you cast an enchantment spell, you may draw a card.

card.name: Vernal Bloom
card.text: Whenever a Forest is tapped for mana, its controller adds {G} to his or her mana pool.

card.name: Vexing Arcanix
card.text: {3}, {T}: Target player names a card, then reveals the top card of his or her library. If it's the named card, the player puts it into his or her hand. Otherwise, the player puts it into his or her graveyard and Vexing Arcanix deals 2 damage to him or her.

card.name: Viashino Sandstalker
card.text: Haste At the beginning of the end step, return Viashino Sandstalker to its owner's hand.

card.name: Vicious Hunger
card.text: Vicious Hunger deals 2 damage to target creature and you gain 2 life.

card.name: Vine Trellis
card.text: Defender {T}: Add {G} to your mana pool.

card.name: Volcanic Hammer
card.text: Volcanic Hammer deals 3 damage to target creature or player.

card.name: Wall of Air
card.text: Defender, flying

card.name: Wall of Spears
card.text: Defender First strike

card.name: Warped Devotion
card.text: Whenever a permanent is returned to a player's hand, that player discards a card.

card.name: Western Paladin
card.text: {B}{B}, {T}: Destroy target white creature.

card.name: Wing Snare
card.text: Destroy target creature with flying.

card.name: Wood Elves
card.text: When Wood Elves enters the battlefield, search your library for a Forest card and put that card onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

card.name: Wooden Sphere
card.text: Whenever a player casts a green spell, you may pay {1}. If you do, you gain 1 life.

card.name: Worship
card.text: If you control a creature, damage that would reduce your life total to less than 1 reduces it to 1 instead.

card.name: Wrath of God
card.text: Destroy all creatures. They can't be regenerated.

card.name: Wrath of Marit Lage
card.text: When Wrath of Marit Lage enters the battlefield, tap all red creatures. Red creatures don't untap during their controllers' untap steps.

card.name: Yavimaya Enchantress
card.text: Yavimaya Enchantress gets +1/+1 for each enchantment on the battlefield.

card.name: Zombify
card.text: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.

card.name: Zur's Weirding
card.text: Players play with their hands revealed. If a player would draw a card, he or she reveals it instead. Then any other player may pay 2 life. If a player does, put that card into its owner's graveyard. Otherwise, that player draws a card.
